name: fn-to-cli
description: Convert typescript functions to CLI executables.

scripts.test-example: cd example;npm remove fn-to-cli;npm install ../;npm run build;npm run test;cd ../;
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run build-bin && npm run build-md
scripts.pre-bump: npm run dead-files && npm run spell-check && npm run lint && npm run test-src && npm run build && npm run test-example && git add --all && git commit
scripts.release: npm run pre-bump && npm publish --access public && npm run after-bump
scripts.bump-patch: npm run pre-bump && npm version patch && npm publish && npm run after-bump
scripts.bump-minor: npm run pre-bump && npm version minor && npm publish && npm run after-bump
scripts.bump-major: npm run pre-bump && npm version major && npm publish && npm run after-bump

author: lillallol
